casebody.data:
Mary O’HALLORAN, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 19, 1924.) No. 253. O’Connor & Donnellan, of New York City (W. E. Riseley, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error, William Hayward, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Elmer I-I. Lemon, Sp. Asst. U. S. Atty., of Middle-town, N. Y., of counsel), for^the United States.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAYER, Circuit Judges/

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
